* "Miaodi" (hereinafter referred to as "I") is a small fresh application. But I also pay great attention to privacy and security. To this end, I have added the "encryption" function as early as version 1.0, and added the "fingerprint access" function in version 2.0.19. \n* All these motives are for your privacy. I hereby promise that I will not use your privacy (including "cloud services" and not limited to "cloud services") without notifying you. And the encryption function I provided has no backdoor, and the only way to decrypt is to use a key.
Account or Password can\'t be null
Your beginning password is 123456ÔºÅYou can use the password and email to login MarkdownL
Fail to load, Try to reload
Haven\'t activate, Click to know more about Miaodi VIP

Users should read this User Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the "Agreement") carefully before using the services provided by "Miaodi" (hereinafter collectively referred to as "Miaodi"). ¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Once the user logs in or uses the service of "Miaodi", it is deemed that the user has understood and expressly agreed to the contents of this agreement, and this agreement immediately has legal effect between the user and this "Miaodi".
 I. Agreement body 

This agreement is an agreement between the user and Meow Drop about the user's use of the service. 

About this service 

The content of this service refers to the related services provided by Meow Drop to its partners and users through this application (the "Service").
For users using this service, "Miaodi" will continuously enrich the terminals, forms, etc. of users using this service.
Licensed scope:
 -(1) "Miaodi" grants the user a personal, non-transferable and non-exclusive license to use this application. 
 -(2) All other intellectual property rights that are not expressly authorized in this section and other terms of this agreement are still reserved by Miaodi. "Miaodi" does not constitute a waiver of this right if it fails to exercise any of the foregoing rights. 

Third, account login

In order to use this application, users may need to enter personal information for login and use. The user is fully aware that the account provided to Miaodi is limited to my own use, otherwise, the user may cause infringement to the user or others. The user promises and agrees that using the same device, the same ID number or account to use the services under this agreement is deemed to be the user's own behavior. Users should properly keep their own equipment, identity documents and account password information, and carefully hand over to others to use or use other people's equipment, identity documents or account information. If the user violates this agreement and causes losses to the user or others, Miaodi shall not Will not bear any legal responsibility. If the user causes losses to Miaodi, he shall bear all the losses suffered by Miaodi.

Fourth, the use of applications

If a user obtains this application or an installer with the same name from an application that is not a "Miaodi" partner or a non- "Miaodi" partner, "Miaodi" cannot guarantee the normal use of the application, And is not responsible for the losses caused to users. 

Five, application updates 

In order to improve the user experience and improve the service content, Miaodi will continuously strive to provide users with application updates (these updates may take the form of application replacement, modification, functional enhancement, version upgrades, etc.).

In order to improve the user experience and ensure the security of the service and the consistency of its functions, Miaodi has the right to update the application without any special notice to the user, or to change or restrict some of the effects of the application. 

Protection of personal information of users 

The protection of user's personal information is a basic principle of Miaodi. Miaodi will take reasonable measures to protect users' personal information. Except as provided by laws and regulations and authorized by the user, Miaodi will not disclose or disclose the user's personal information to any third party without the user's permission. 

Generally, users can browse and modify the information they submit at any time, but due to security and identification considerations, users may not be able to modify the initial registration information and other verification information provided during registration. 

7. Intellectual Property Statement 

Miaodi is the intellectual property right holder of this application. Intellectual property rights such as copyrights, trademarks, patents, trade secrets of this application, and all information content related to this application (including but not limited to text, pictures, audio, video, graphics, interface design, layout framework, related Data or electronic documents, etc.) are protected by the laws and regulations of the People's Republic of China and the corresponding international treaties. Miaodi enjoys the above-mentioned relevant intellectual property rights in accordance with the law, except for the rights that the relevant right holders should enjoy in accordance with the law. 

Without the written consent of Miaodi or related rights holders, users may not, for any commercial or non-commercial purpose, independently or license any third party to implement, utilize, or transfer the above intellectual property rights. 

Terminal security responsibility 

Users understand and agree that this application or service, like most Internet applications and services, may be affected by many factors (including but not limited to user reasons, network service quality, social environment, etc.); it may also be affected by various (Including but not limited to illegal use of user data by others to conduct real-life harassment; other applications downloaded or installed by users or other websites visited may contain viruses, Trojan horses or other malicious programs, threatening the user's terminal The security of information and data, which in turn affects the normal use of the application, the service, etc.). Therefore, users should strengthen the awareness of information security and personal information protection, and pay attention to password protection to avoid loss. When the above situation occurs, "Miaodi" will try to cooperate with the relevant parties as soon as possible to repair it in time, but the loss caused to the user by "Miaodi" is exempted to the extent permitted by law. 

Users are not allowed to create, publish, use, or spread malicious programs used to steal "Miaodi" accounts and other people's personal information and property. 

Maintaining the security and normal use of applications is the joint responsibility of Miaodi and users. Miaodi will reasonably and prudently take necessary technical measures to protect user terminal information and data in accordance with industry standards. 

To the extent permitted by law, Miaodi is not responsible for service interruption or obstruction caused by: 
 -(1) Damaged by computer viruses, Trojan horses or other malicious programs or hackers. 
 -(2) The computer software, system, hardware, and communication lines of the user or Meow Drop have failed. 
 -(3) Improper user operation. 
 -(4) The user uses the service in a manner not authorized by Miaodi. 
 -(5) Other situations that Miaodi cannot control or reasonably foresee. 

Nine, force majeure and reasonable exemption 

"Force majeure" means an objective situation that occurred after the signing of this agreement and that the affected party cannot foresee, cannot avoid, and cannot overcome. Such events include, but are not limited to, floods, fires, droughts, typhoons, earthquakes and other natural disasters, strikes, riots, riots and wars, and acts or omissions of government departments, adjustments in laws, regulations or policies, changes in data sources (including but not limited to (Limited to changes in its service content and form), domestic data channel paralysis, hacking attacks, computer virus intrusion, new virus outbreaks, network interruptions due to telecommunication operator problems, server inaccessibility, power outages, system failures, transmission lines, communication failures, etc. "Miaodi" beyond their control. Failure to perform or complete performance of this agreement due to force majeure is not considered a breach of contract, and no liability for breach of contract shall be assumed. \ n
X. Others 

The use of this application or the service by the user shall be deemed that the user has read and agreed to be bound by this agreement. Miaodi has the right to modify the terms of this agreement when necessary. Users can check the relevant agreement terms in this application and the latest version of this service. After the terms of this agreement are changed, if the user continues to log in, use this application, this service, it is deemed that the user has accepted the revised agreement. If the user does not accept the modified agreement, they should stop using the application. 

The establishment, entry into force, performance, interpretation and dispute resolution of this Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China (excluding conflict of laws). 

If there is any dispute or dispute between the user and Miaodi, it shall be settled through friendly negotiation first; if the negotiation fails, the user agrees to submit the dispute or dispute to the jurisdiction of the people's court where the defendant is located. 

The headings of all the terms of this agreement are for convenience only. They have no actual meaning and cannot be used as a basis for interpreting the meaning of this agreement. 5. No matter what the terms of this agreement are partially invalid or unenforceable, the remaining terms are still valid and binding on both parties.

Your book has character never delete, please try again after delete them all!
You can\'t delete this Book, cause it is the default book
Please delete in the file manager
Please choose your save method\nPs:If version above AndroidQ please choose [Custom-Save]
Save success, the path of file: Storage\\MarkdownL
Please fill your new Book name!\nYou will add a new BookÔºÅEnjoy yourselfÔºÅ
Please choose your Alphabet file(.ttf OR .TTF)
set flag, and remember to finish every day
Click the title can change the book
Accept the passge that friend share with you!
PsÔºöIf you never sign up before,please input your Username and password in the field, then click the sign up button
Please make sure your the last of your WebDav path have the \'/\'
Found your WebDav is Empty which maybe connect is wrong
I share a page with youÔºåhurry up to look üëâ https://sunshinesudio.club:8012/share/page?code=
If open,App can use your clip to load
Using,App can use your clip to load
Also use this bg as the editing bg
Choose the white text as the color og editing
If on, Once use the clip to load show the tips
If off, When use the clip to load never show the tips
If off, Enter the application without the password
If you haven\'t set PIN, tha PIN can activate. Besides, No more than 6 numbers
If off, Enter the application needed the password
Do you want to open the quick delete
Change the quickBar position,the number bigger the more priority
Auto load the Data to local form cloud. Miaodi cloud is default. If you use the WebDav, WebDav is the default.
Click on the bottom right corner to add daily goals :)
Delete failed, please make sure the network is unblocked!
Delete failed, please make sure the network is unblocked! And your Webdav is configured correctly
Delete cloud backups at the same time
The line being edited remains in color, while the other lines are grayed out
Before customizing the key, please make sure to decrypt all articles, otherwise the encrypted articles will not be able to be decrypted normally.
Title is empty, please enter and try again
Enter two lines, auto-indent, center the article title
The word count exceeds the 60w limit, which may cause irreversible damage to App application data. Please ensure that other articles have been backed up.
Click on the shortcut record to cancel it in the settings
You can see how to use the app here and the latest information about us
After opening, the articles will be sorted in reverse order of creation time.
View and manage articles on cloud services
Can be used on multiple devices (Android&iOS&PC) after opening
Every time the app is opened, a notification will be created in the notification bar for quick recording of inspiration
Open the edited article for preview by default
After editing the Markdown text, swipe left to see a preview of the corresponding position
After opening the item, open the edit page in one go, no animation
After turning on the item, the greeting statement on the head will disappear
Make custom edit page and home page backgrounds
You need to put the files in "Android / data / cn.sunshinesudio.libv / files / Load /", and then click this option. Imported files will be deleted
You have confirmed that "Android / data / cn.sunshinesudio.libv / files / Load /" already has your file to be imported
The following permissions are required: 1. Obtain the storage and read permission of the phone\'s calendar (for todo reminders)
Hello, my friends, "Miaodi" needs the following permissions: 1. Obtain storage and read permissions on the phone for timely backup of article data and file export and save
You have refused the required permission!
Back up to the „ÄåAndroid/data/cn.sunshinesudio.libv/files/„Äçpath, please transfer in time after the backup is completed.
This page form cloud and local
Dear, remember to complete today\'s task! You are so cute when you work hard
use activation code to activate Miaodi
you can use the activate code to activate Miaodi

TipsÔºö
If you want to quickly Input Num 20,
So you need to fill the 2 to the first line, meaning the cursor will appear after the 20. 
The third line is use as description. 
The fourth line is fill with the priority.
An error occurred. We\'re deeply sorry.
Click the button to add page
The text to replace the previous
You need to set a custom font to open
Remind to complete the daily goal every night at 9 o\'clock
Back up all the local data again
An Error appear in your account and you need to login again
The backup data is under the system folder /Download/miaodi/BackUp/
Your editing text will be displayed in the desktop widget
WebDav cloud articles were deleted successfully at the same time
At the same time, delete the Miaodi cloud article backup successfully
The local data of the selected article has been deleted
Number of articles deleted this time
WebDav backup: please make sure your title contains only text

# What I want to say to my friends Hello duck, I am Meowdi App, your life recorder. In this complex and fast-paced world, Miaodi hopes that his friends can have time every day to record their heart, in the most primitive way --- words. Miaodi was born in 2020. It is a 20-year-old. It is very young and has a lot of imperfections. However, it has been perfecting itself very carefully, just to give you a better experience. Here, Miaodi will treat each paragraph of your text in the most careful way, and the content you wrote will almost never be lost, **even if you power off the device instantly, unless you actively delete it**. In addition, we have specially configured a writing mode for you who like to write. The clear paragraphs will make your writing more comfortable. You can also use the focus mode to devote yourself to your writing. In terms of cloud backup of the article, we provide two choices of Webdav and Miaodi cloud services, so that you can switch devices anytime, anywhere, and follow your records. We also provide a three-level classification of books-chapters-articles, where you can mobilize your own articles as you like, without restriction. Miaodi not only optimizes writing, but also provides a lot of custom functions. You can use a lot of custom functions for you to use. Such as **custom fonts**, **custom backgrounds**, **custom CSS styles**, **custom shortcut input**, etc., these are all freely available for use, just to let small partners It feels more comfortable to use. Meowdi also provides a system-level Todo reminder service, so that you no longer miss an important thing, and your time is back in your hands. Supplemented by the daily check-in function, the joy of completing each day\'s Flag can be accumulated, and if there is aspiration, things come true. With love, everything will be beautiful. > More detailed instructions: https://www.miaodiapp.com/help.html Miaodi team official website: https://www.miaodiapp.com 2021
